channel.title: grandparents on David Collantes
channel.description: Recent content in grandparents on David Collantes

item.title: Grandfather has left us
item.description: Grandfather died today. Kim was very close to him because she lived with her grandparents since she was young, until we got married. Back in Vietnam, when she was in elementary school, grandpa took her and her siblings to school, and picked them up in his bicycle every day. He was more than a grandfather to her. He was, throughout her life, a father figure. Grandpa was a soft spoken man.
